text: A box truck, also called a box van, cube truck, cube van, is a truck or van with a cuboid-shaped box on the back. They are categorized as medium-sized trucks. Examples of box trucks: Isuzu NPR, Ford F-750, Chevrolet Silverado 3500HD. == Related pages == *Multi-stop truck *Flatbed truck == References == ==Other websites== Category:Trucks Category:Vans
title: Box truck
